description: This trap signifies that the margin estimate
is below a customer set threshold value. This is a trap
of 'minor' class.
A unique value for each interface. Its value
ranges between 1 and the value of ifNumber. The
value for each interface must remain constant at
least from one re-initialization of the entity's
network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::ifIndex

description: This trap signifies that the error rate estimates
is above a customer set threshold value. This is a trap
of 'minor' class.
A unique value for each interface. Its value
ranges between 1 and the value of ifNumber. The
value for each interface must remain constant at
least from one re-initialization of the entity's
network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::ifIndex

description: The LTU configured does NOT match with the NTU connected
to the DSL port indicated by the ifIndex.

event.Summary: Configured LTU does not match with the connected NTU

description: A unique value for each interface. Its value
ranges between 1 and the value of ifNumber. The
value for each interface must remain constant at
least from one re-initialization of the entity's
network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::ifIndex

description: This trap signifies that the margin estimate has gone
above a customer set threshold value. this is a trap
of 'minor' class. this trap compliments the xdslMarginLow
trap
A unique value for each interface. Its value
ranges between 1 and the value of ifNumber. The
value for each interface must remain constant at
least from one re-initialization of the entity's
network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::ifIndex

description: This trap signifies that the error rate estimates
gone below a customer set threshold value. This is a trap
of 'minor' class. This trap compliments the xdslErrorRateHigh
trap.

event.Summary: Error rate estimate back to normal

description: A unique value for each interface. Its value
ranges between 1 and the value of ifNumber. The
value for each interface must remain constant at
least from one re-initialization of the entity's
network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::ifIndex

description: This trap signifies that the test has completed on one of the
ports. This trap compliments the xdslTestStart trap.
A unique value for each interface. Its value
ranges between 1 and the value of ifNumber. The
value for each interface must remain constant at
least from one re-initialization of the entity's
network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::ifIndex
